entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for July 03, 2024

summary.caption: “Well, it came from your division, Sanders, and as you can see, it’s covered with honey and molasses! … You know what that makes this, Sanders?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for July 03, 2024

summary.caption: “Check this guy out, Lois. … Artificial for sure.”

The Far Side comic 4 for July 03, 2024

summary.caption: “… and then the second group comes in—‘row, row, row your boat’…”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for July 03, 2024

summary.caption: “It’s a cute trick, Warren, but the Schuberts are here for dinner, so just ‘abracadabra’ this thing back to where it was.”
